pages.text: $(li)The Golden Pet Bandage is the upgrade of the common Pet Bandage.$(br)$(li)Just right click your diying pet while you are holding the Golden Pet Bandage on your hand to revive it with with regeneration effect during 20 seconds.
$(li)This item can be crafted placing a Pet Bandage and Gold Nuggets in a Crafting Table.$(br2)Insert a picture of a Flute
